page.title: 18Village Life
page.content: {Mr.Jackson}is the chairman of the Parish Council.He thinks that Cobham is an attractive place in which to live,being close to London and the coast.He thinks that improvements could be made,it would be nice to have tea room and a better village hall. Mr.Jackson has lived in Cobham all his life.He prefers living in the country where there is a good community spirit. {Mr.Gibson}(the mayor of Gravesham) would like to see more shops and better pavements.He chose to live in Cobham as it is in the country but close to London,where he works.The house he lives in is large,has a big garden and is very peaceful.He spends most of his spare time at home.He attends the local church and other village functions.
